snippet: The Obama administration said the increases were much greater in states that expanded Medicaid eligibility under the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Obama administration reports that enrollment in Medicaid has increased by three million people, to a total of 62 million, largely because of the Affordable Care Act; as expected, increases were much greater in states that expanded Medicaid eligibility.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said the increases were much greater in states that expanded Medicaid eligibility under the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Law Lifts Enrollment in Medicaid by Millions
headline.print_headline: Law Lifts Enrollment in Medicaid by Millions

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
